1.0.name: wordpress/captchaad
1.0.description:
CaptchaAd is the first provider in the world to combine conventional CAPTCHAs (spam protection, of which around 280 million are generated worldwide every day) with high-quality video advertising. The novel aspect of the CaptchaAds is that concrete answers to a video clip, which can be made up of the product name, slogan or other keywords, have to be typed into the Captcha field instead of a random combination of letters and numbers. This makes the advertising message much more effective than other online advertising (100% contact with the advertising medium, extremely high advertising effectiveness).

CaptchaAd has applied for worldwide patents for this technology.

CaptchaAd offers an additional revenue strea
